DESCRIPTION: The human-friendly name of the page used to identify the page in Setup tools.TIP It’s a great idea to have a naming convention for your custom help pages. For example, start all custom help pages with “Help_” and then the object name.
The API name for the page. You can use the auto-filled value.
An optional description of the page.

FIELD: Available for Lightning Experience, Experience Builder sites, and the mobile app
DESCRIPTION: Select this option if your custom object is available in the Salesforce mobile app.
